skills.desc: Attacks 2 random enemies. Each hit places a [Provoke] debuff for 2 turns.
skills.name: Consuming Furor

skills.desc: Attacks all enemies. Places a [True Fear] debuff for 2 turns.
skills.name: Fearsome Lash

skills.desc: Has a 20% chance of placing a [Freeze] debuff for 1 turn on the attacker when hit. This debuff cannot be resisted.
skills.name: Cloak of Stasis [P]

skills.desc: Immune to [Stun], [Freeze], [Sleep], [Provoke], [Block Active Skills], [Block Passive Skills], [Fear], and [True Fear] debuffs. Also immune to HP exchange effects, HP balancing effects, and cooldown increasing effects.
skills.name: Almighty Immunity [Passive]

skills.desc: Damage from Continuous Damage decreased by 60%.
skills.name: Continuous Damage Resistance II
